---
### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $3000 - $3500. (🔺= great, 🔸= ok, 🔻= situational)*
1. **Buy** [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) 
2. **Buy** one of:
    - [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) 
      - Your normal pick. It works well into teams that don't force close range fights, and is especially strong into  [Zenyatta](hero_3c4002ee-e694-48ed-9730-70fd48773317), [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0), [Sigma](hero_646d9571-c40a-4403-b6c1-fb67adb6112d), and [Orisa](hero_91644d44-1093-4f62-ac51-020975465e85), who can easily punish you if you try to get in their face and spam abilities
    - [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) 
      - Pick this into teams that you know you'll be able to land a lot of axes on, or comps that might force close-range fights (if you're against [Reinhardt](hero_a3b6ca2c-6cbd-43dc-bb78-a728e42fba49), for example)
    - We don't take [Let’s Go Win](item_80df18f3-8530-4e55-8ea3-9ac7a3f12508) anymore: it was nerfed **hard** with Season 17, and now other powers are better this round
3. **Buy** one of these combos:
    - [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318) 
      - Choose this if you have [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) 
    - [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7) and [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7) 
      - Choose this if you have [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) 

---
### ⚔️ Playstyle
**Play safe until you find your opening.** 

- [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) 
  - Use cover and jiggle peek to poke with your gun. Aim for headshots -- on the tank is fine, if needed -- to proc [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c), which provides regen from [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318) and also from its bleed. Then, once you find your opening (for example, a big cooldown like [Sigma](hero_646d9571-c40a-4403-b6c1-fb67adb6112d)'s Rock or [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000)'s Sleep is used), push with Shout
  - Play a little bit of distance where possible (since a good portion of your damage is from your gun). You have decent AP damage from [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418), so when you need to get in there, you should be fine -- just try to keep [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) active at all times for some survivability
- [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) 
  - Get in there! Weave Quick Melee between abilities to proc [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7), and you can feasibly 1v1 most brawl characters, like [Reinhardt](hero_a3b6ca2c-6cbd-43dc-bb78-a728e42fba49). Don't go too crazy though, since getting hit by abilities like Charge or [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000)'s sleep would be... not great

### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $6000. (🔺= great, 🔸= ok, 🔻= situational)*
1. **Buy** one of:
    - 🔺 [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) if you have [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) 
    - 🔺 [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) if you have [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) 
    - Most heroes won't have enough damage to totally poke you out yet, so you're (mostly) safe to build full damage this round

### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $10000. (🔺= great, 🔸= ok, 🔻= situational)*

Okay, now the build will get a bit less confusing to follow, since you'll have both [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) and [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c), and I don't have to write *"If you have X..."* anymore. Yippee!

1. **Buy** [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) or [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) (whichever you're missing)
2. **Sell** [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) if you have it; replace it with [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) 
    - You can keep it if you're constantly having to close-range brawl and need to force AP, but otherwise a mix is better
3. **Sell** [Siphon Gloves](item_099f8177-c2a4-4e13-b321-99349f8b1eb7) and [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7) if you have them; replace with [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318) 
4. **Buy** [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b) 
    - This might seem like a weird pick, but it's super extremely awesome. [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) triggers the "on Weapon Damage" effect, and since the WP bleed ticks constantly, hitting one headshot provides all 5 stacks immediately
    - So, hit a headshot every 3 seconds (it can be on the tank if that's easier), and you gain 10% WP and 25 Health, plus 25% AP from the 5 stacks
    - You're effectively sitting at 30% WP and 35% AP right now, which are powerhouse stats for round 3!

Also can be useful into [Orisa](hero_91644d44-1093-4f62-ac51-020975465e85) or a [Mei](hero_36fd67f0-19df-4c50-add9-709cfb147cb0) with [Coulder](item_12ad88e8-650a-44ec-b1e1-a39646055d68)

---
### ⚔️ Playstyle changes
**This is your power spike round!**

You're a bit of a beast. You have strong WP *and* AP thanks to [Superflexor](item_580b77b4-0d63-469b-99a8-5372c55dfc1b)'s cool interaction, so you're probably dealing more damage than anyone else in the lobby.

**Tip:** hold the Quick Melee button during (and for a moment after) Carnage: this animation cancels and queues a melee to hit at the first available frame

### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $11000. (🔺= great, 🔸= ok, 🔻= situational)*
1. **Buy** [Cut ‘em, Gracie!](item_83876e20-96d8-472f-9861-6682040d18a3) 
    - This power used to be a stinker, but the two recent buffs make it **incredible**:
      1. On-hit changes:
          - The description used to read: *"Each enemy hit by Jagged Blade **while it returns to you** reduces its cooldown."*
          - It now reads: *"Each enemy hit by Jagged Blade reduces its cooldown."*
          - This means that a.) landing your knife and b.) having it drag through someone **both** reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds each. With 25% Cooldown Reduction (which we're building towards), 1 hit and 1 drag resets the cooldown **immediately (!!!)**. This is incredible in combination with the items below (as well as with [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8), which effectively lowers Carnage cooldown)
      2. The cooldown reduction per hit was **doubled (!!!)** from 1 second to 2 seconds
2. **Sell** [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) 
3. **Sell** [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) 
4. **Sell** [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318) 
5. **Buy** [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8)
    - **This item is awesome!** Provides crazy survivability, plus a nice damage boost:
      - 50 armor is awesome in general, but especially high fire rate characters like [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546), and shotgun characters like [Reaper](hero_0449752f-1c58-487b-b9a0-ca727d784457) (see [Armor on the Overwatch Wiki](https://overwatch.fandom.com/wiki/Hit_points#Armor)
      - The armor regenerates whenever you use an ability, and JQ has super low cooldowns with [Chop Chop](item_6f404c88-210f-473d-a7e6-e03547a074b8) and [Cut ‘em, Gracie!](item_83876e20-96d8-472f-9861-6682040d18a3), so you can have it active nearly 100% of the time
      - 15 AP is a nice buff to ability damage, wound damage (and therefore self-healing), and overhealth from Shout
    - **Note:** the armor regen doesn't stack with itself, but it *does* stack with wound healing, which you'll be getting all the time
    - **Note:** armor regen is NOT prevented by [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000)'s anti-heal OR by [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) 
6. **Buy** [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) 
    - Maybe even more awesome than [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8), since the Overhealth from this item can stack infinitely
    - **Note:** the overhealth DOES stack, it DOES stack with wound healing, and it DOES stack with [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) 
    - **Note:** overhealth is NOT prevented by [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000)'s anti-heal OR by [Cybervenom](item_210a8582-91ec-4cf3-968a-a443f3a0c505) 
7. **Buy** [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7) (no worries if you can't afford it)

### ⚔️ Playstyle changes
Spam abilities! As long as you're hitting your knives and using cover, you become really, really hard to kill (thanks to [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8) and [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0)). Remember that wounds **from different sources** stack, so if your rotation is something like [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) → axe → knife, you can have 3 wounds active on a target at once, for a neat amount of damage, as well as self-heal, Overhealth from [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0), Armor from [Lumerico Fusion Drive](item_3da81000-333c-460a-a1a2-09441bfda9c8), *and* Overhealth from [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643).

We're not at the 25% CDR needed for an instant knife reset yet, but if you rotate your abilities as above, it should almost always be up in time to use it again.

All that is to say... get in there (and maybe get a wrist injury from spamming knives)!

**Useful links:** [Item tier lists](https://imgur.com/a/INmlxrR) | [Power tier list](https://i.imgur.com/lZJzP8Y.png) | [Matchup tier list](https://i.imgur.com/6LLrJzs.png) | [Teammate tier list](https://i.imgur.com/cgWB7K6.png) | [JQ on Stadium Wiki](https://overwatch.fandom.com/wiki/Junker_Queen/Stadium)

---
### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $10000. (🔺= great, 🔸= ok, 🔻= situational)*
1. **Sell** [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7)
2. **Buy** [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) 
    - 10% CDR for [Cut ‘em, Gracie!](item_83876e20-96d8-472f-9861-6682040d18a3) resets, 10% WP, and up to 15% extra stacking WP. What's not to love?
3. Optionally, replace [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) with [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) 
    - Pick [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) if you're confidently able to get up close and spam abilities without exploding
    - This takes us to a maximum of 45% WP and 70% AP at any given moment, which I can almost guarantee are higher total damage stats than anybody else in your game

### 📈 Extra cash?
*Look here if you have spare cash after all core changes. (🔺= great, 🔸= ok, 🔻= situational)*

- **Over $5000:**
  1. Replace [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) / [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) with one of:
      - 🔺 [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) 
        - Pick this if you want more AP
        - Comes with 10% CDR to reach the 25% breakpoint (see [Martian Mender](item_0099632b-4e18-450e-844f-22c40e51bc98) description below for more info)
      - 🔻 [Martian Mender](item_0099632b-4e18-450e-844f-22c40e51bc98) 
        - Pick this if you can't survive long enough
          - 3% life per second isn't *craaaaazy* good (it's probably around 20-25 HP per sec by this point in the match), but we're also here for the 10% CDR, since that takes us to the 25% CDR breakpoint needed for [Cut ‘em, Gracie!](item_83876e20-96d8-472f-9861-6682040d18a3) to be able to instantly reset knife cooldown with 1 hit and 1 dragthrough (or just 2 dragthroughs)

### 🎯 Core changes
*Required cash: $4000 - $5000. (🔺= great, 🔸= ok, 🔻= situational)*
1. **Buy** one of:
    - [Bloodcrazed](item_9ac9b9a7-793d-4f2f-9447-4b55ba7bc3f5)
      - My usual pick. Decent survivability that's often needed for close-range fights
    - [Bow Down](item_0673e9ed-37dd-4e58-acef-77e0fbe613fb)
      - Usable against teams that don't really have a defense for Rampage (i.e. no [Kiriko](hero_70a0ac5c-2a55-4fab-beeb-2f570886426f), [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0), [Reaper](hero_0449752f-1c58-487b-b9a0-ca727d784457), [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed), [Mei](hero_36fd67f0-19df-4c50-add9-709cfb147cb0))
    - [Merciless Magnetism](item_4b947939-bc68-4160-9388-28432bf71909) 
      - Strong against teams with high mobility that mean you can't hit many knives (think [Lucio](hero_b38c5d54-a585-4545-b0b8-4d4b205b3768), [Mercy](hero_0e213bfc-3ca9-49c6-9036-e7f344b752da), [Juno](hero_035c63b7-084c-4abd-9de5-c9a00e9b6a18), [Freja](hero_e80840a1-845d-4008-966c-585b7cb4a424))
    - [Let’s Go Win](item_80df18f3-8530-4e55-8ea3-9ac7a3f12508) 
      - Recently nerfed to 50% instead of 100%, but still okay in combination with the rest of your CDR items and powers
      - Your 25% CDR with this power cuts the cooldown to around 5 seconds after an elim
2. Replace [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) / [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) with one of:
      - 🔺 [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) 
        - Pick this if you want more AP
        - Comes with 10% CDR to reach the 25% breakpoint (see [Martian Mender](item_0099632b-4e18-450e-844f-22c40e51bc98) description below for more info)
      - 🔻 [Martian Mender](item_0099632b-4e18-450e-844f-22c40e51bc98) 
        - Pick this if you can't survive long enough
          - 3% life per second isn't *craaaaazy* good (it's probably around 20-25 HP per sec by this point in the match), but we're also here for the 10% CDR, since that takes us to the 25% CDR breakpoint needed for [Cut ‘em, Gracie!](item_83876e20-96d8-472f-9861-6682040d18a3) to be able to instantly reset knife cooldown with 1 hit and 1 dragthrough (or just 2 dragthroughs)
      - Other viable options, if you don't care about the CDR breakpoint, are [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) (damage) and [Scav Scraps](item_b24d8c46-7022-49e2-b50d-7cc20a27fb05) (Overhealth)

---
### ⚔️ Playstyle changes
Okay, now you've hit 25% CDR, you need to focus on hitting knives. If you can't, take [Merciless Magnetism](item_4b947939-bc68-4160-9388-28432bf71909). Hit a knife and it's on a 2 second cooldown; drag it through someone too, and it's back with a 0 second cooldown. You only stay alive by spamming abilities, so mash that keyboard. Don't forget about good ol' [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) -- you still have decent WP, so stick with the same ability cycle of [Royal Bullets](item_3dee6c30-86d8-4d60-b877-4d78b6a6da7c) → axe → knife → repeat (shouting as needed, to engage or to back off).

Good luck!
